item.title: Re: hanging out?
item.content:encoded:
If you during the day is among the once who have the most friendspoints with an ally you will the NEXT day get a message about this. This is done by the game and you dont need to do anything except gathering the friendspoints!

As said above and in the guide. When your are hanging out with someone you can learn their jutsus for half the cost and you can use their jutsus in missions for half the manacost!

Another good thing with hanging out is that you get 30 extra stamina if you have a glowing-mood-ring and 100 extra stamina if you hangout with shorty while having a silver-hairpin.

Hope I have made it clearer for you now!
